Name: Renamer
About the game: Renamer is a graphical file renaming utility which makes the renaming of thousands of files both simple and convenient. The workflow is simple: 1) Import your files, one-by-one or by folder 2) Add and configure renaming rules, which are easy to understand yet powerful 3) Save your renamed files to an output location, or rename them in place Renamer also features the ability to: Save and load renaming rule presets Easily revert your changes Preview your changes before any saving is done If you work with a large number of files, let Renamer help you manage and simplify your workflow.
